QuestData.Title: The Snackrifice
QuestData.Description: They took my grummles! Hozen don't eat grummles, but yeti do. And the Knucklethumps have a yeti.$b$bPlease rescue my grummles. Cut them down or let them out of cages. Rescue them any way you can.$b$bMany fortunes and rewards if you do this.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue 5 Imprisoned Grummles by cutting them down or releasing them from cages.
QuestData.CompletionText: Other grummles say I not have good luck. The call me "Luckydon't".$b$bBut now I have friend $r who is a big luckydo! We'll show them.
QuestData.RewardText: Today is a day of many good and bad fortunes. Bad fortune that hozen stole my grummles. Good fortune that my $r saves my grummles. Bad fortune that so many hozen must die to learn lesson. Good fortune that $rs are luckydos and know how to fight.$b$bGrummles are not fighters. We carry, we explore, and we are content.
